talk1039:
<sp:3:0:2:0101><snd:Greeting_00>Oh, look at that! <sp:5:0:0>You made room for my
gift.<sp:5:0:0> Here, it's all yours, along with my
thanks.
talk1040: <sp:3:0:2:0b01><snd:SurpriseL_00>Huh?! What in the world is happening?
talk1090:
<sp:3:0:2:0401><snd:SurpriseS_00>Oh, I have something for you too!<sp:5:0:0>
Here, take this.
talk1044:
<sp:3:0:2:0b01><snd:SurpriseM_01>Hm? <sp:5:0:0>Finley isn't over here!<sp:5:1:0> Maybe we
should start over...
talk1045:
<sp:3:0:2:0b01><snd:SurpriseS>Um, what are you doing?<sp:5:0:0> I'd appreciate it
if you didn't do anything weird to the raft.
talk1095:
<sp:3:0:2:0101><snd:Happy_01>Just like Sasan, I found this on my way
here.<sp:5:0:0> It matches his!
talk1047:
<sp:3:0:2:0a01><snd:Scare_01>I was worried I wouldn't make it for a
while there. <sp:5:0:0>Please let me know when
you're ready to try again.
talk1048:
<sp:3:0:2:0401><snd:SurpriseM_00>Ah! <sp:5:0:0>Hey!<sp:5:1:0> I'm in big trouble if I can't
use that raft!
talk1002:
<sp:3:0:2:0701>Did you also come here in search of
treasure after hearing about the
<clr:0000>ancient manuscript <clr:ffff>from <clr:0000>Kodah<clr:ffff>?
talk1003:
<sp:3:0:2:0301><snd:Think_00>But then Finley swam ahead all by herself
and went <clr:0000>deep inside the cave<clr:ffff>.
talk1004:
<sp:3:0:2:0301><snd:Sad_01>"Don't lag behind!"<sp:5:0:0> she hollered back
at me. Easier said than done, I'm afraid.

<sp:3:0:2:0c01>Finley thinks I'm capable of anything.
She really is such a sweetheart.

<sp:3:0:2:0301>I've been training like mad, but...<sp:5:0:0>
I'm just not a very good swimmer.
talk1052:
<sp:3:0:2:0101><snd:TalkPositive_00>What a great day, Finley. <sp:5:0:0>How about we
head back to Zora's Domain? I can't wait
to tell Kodah...
The story from that ancient
manuscript was real!
talk1005:
<sp:3:0:2:0c01><snd:Tired_01>Nope. The water in this cave <clr:0000>goes up and
down drastically<clr:ffff>, so even if you manage
to get going, you end up on a rock.
That means I have no way forward, so I'm
not sure what to do.

<sp:3:0:2:0a01>I promised Finley... <sp:5:0:0>"Of course we'll find
the treasure together! Anything for you!"
That's what I said. <sp:5:0:0>Ugh, what should I do?
talk1054:
<sp:3:0:2:0101><snd:Chat_01>That's right! <sp:5:0:0>It's an ancient manuscript
left behind by <clr:0000>Kodah<clr:ffff>'s ancestors.

Since <clr:0000>Finley <clr:ffff>is Kodah's daughter,
we asked her to tell us all about the
contents of that document.
<sp:3:0:2:0c01>It said something like, "Long, long ago,
at <clr:0000>Tarm Point<clr:ffff>, a blessed stone was
hidden away within a sacred <clr:0000>shrine<clr:ffff>."
0013: Just do the best you can.
talk1055:
<sp:3:0:2:0301><snd:Think_01>I found a perfect little <clr:0000>raft <clr:ffff>there and
thought maybe I could ride it to her
location.
talk1054_00:
<sp:3:0:2:0501>I know it's an ancient manuscript and all,
but the writing...<sp:5:0:0>lacked clarity, if you ask
me.<sp:5:0:0> I was a bit skeptical at first.
talk1008:
<sp:3:0:2:0301><snd:Sad_00>This must be the shrine we heard about
in the ancient manuscript's text... <sp:5:1:0>I had
better wait for <clr:0000>Sasan<clr:ffff> here.
0015: Let's go back for a bit.
talk1056:
<sp:3:0:2:0301><snd:Sad_01>Sasan! Look at you! You're so pale.
<sp:5:0:0>Are you all right?
talk1054_01:
<sp:3:0:2:0101><snd:LaughS_00>But come ON! It's a sacred shrine!<sp:5:1:0> If I was
going to hide treasure, that's exactly
where I'd leave it!
<sp:3:0:2:0101>Finley was so convinced that she
declared, "Treasure hunt, ahoy!"<sp:5:0:0> Next
thing I knew, she'd left Zora's Domain.
She was so excitedâ€”and where Finley
goes, I go. So here I am. We made it all
the way to this cave as a team.
talk1009:
<sp:3:0:2:0c01><snd:Think_01>Hmm. <sp:5:0:0>I wonder if I'm just not trying hard
enough to go deeper into the cave.
talk1057:
<sp:3:0:2:0401><snd:SurpriseM_00>Um...that sounds difficult, but if it's what
you want, sure thing.<sp:5:0:0> Let's please just
take it nice and easy on the way back...
talk1011:
<sp:3:0:2:0001><snd:TalkPositive_00>Hoo boy... <sp:5:0:0>I came here with Finley to
look for treasure in this cave.
talk1058: <sp:3:0:2:0101><snd:Ease_01>There we go! <sp:5:0:0>We made it back somehow.
talk1012:
<snd:Think_00>I need to use this raft to catch up to her,
since she swam on ahead.
talk1059:
<sp:3:0:2:0301><snd:Sad_01>I need a raft to get to Finley. Please don't
take it away or anything.
talk1013:
<sp:3:0:2:0301><snd:Tired_01>But <clr:0000>since the water level keeps rising
and falling<clr:ffff>, I end up getting stuck on the
rocks, and then the raft capsizes.
I wish I could somehow move the raft
forward bit by bit whenever the water
level is high...
talk1002_01:
<sp:3:0:2:0b00><snd:SurpriseM_01>Hoo boy, that startled me!<sp:5:1:0> I didn't expect
to see anyone else here...
0021: Leave the raft for a sec.
talk1002_02:
<sp:3:0:2:0100><snd:Greeting_01>Hey there! <sp:5:1:0>I didn't expect to see anyone
else here.
talk1015:
<sp:3:0:2:0301><snd:Think>Where is <clr:0000>Sasan<clr:ffff>?<sp:5:1:0> We promised each other
that we would find the treasure together...
talk1065:
<sp:3:0:2:0401><snd:Notice_00>Oh, is that not it?<sp:5:0:0> Then...you just
happened upon this place. Huh.

<sp:3:0:2:0101>I'm here with <clr:0000>Finley<clr:ffff>. She's the best
person I've ever met, so there's no better
person to hunt for treasure with!
<sp:3:0:2:0101>Back in Zora's Domain, Finley's mother
<clr:0000>Kodah <clr:ffff>showed us an <clr:0000>ancient manuscript<clr:ffff>.<sp:0:4:0><sp:3:0:2:0c01><snd:QuestionNormal_01>You won't believe what it said...


<sp:3:0:2:0c01>"Long, long ago, at <clr:0000>Tarm Point<clr:ffff>,
a blessed stone was hidden away
within a sacred <clr:0000>shrine<clr:ffff>.
"It was a magnificent <clr:0000>shrine<clr:ffff> that was
overflowing with blessings."<sp:5:0:0> That's what
it said! Or, something like that, at least.
talk1017:
<sp:3:0:2:0401><snd:SurpriseM_00>What? You're heading back?<sp:5:0:0> Oh, hey,
no worries. I understand. <sp:5:0:0>Please be
careful on the way back.
talk1019:
<sp:3:0:2:0801><snd:TalkPositive_00>I have to catch up to Finley! She swam on
ahead all by herself!
talk1020:
<sp:3:0:2:0301><snd:Unconscious_01>Poor Finley. She must be so worried.<sp:5:0:0>
I need to catch up to her as soon as
possible!
talk1068:
<sp:3:0:2:0401><snd:SurpriseM_00>Huh? <sp:5:0:0>You're really going to <sp:5:0:0>help me get
where I need to go on the raft?

<sp:3:0:2:0801>Thank you! You're ridiculously kind!<sp:5:0:0>
I'll happily accept your help.
talk1021:
<sp:3:0:2:0401><snd:Painful>Ah... <sp:5:0:0>I see.<sp:5:1:0> Well, please keep up the
great work.
talk1070: <sp:3:0:2:0101><snd:Greeting_00>Are you ready to raft, by any chance?
talk1069:
<sp:3:0:2:0101><snd:Happy_01>No problem! <sp:5:0:0>Thank you so much for
helping me!<sp:5:0:0> Just let me know whenever
you're ready.
talk1022:
<sp:3:0:2:0301>So, um... Is there anything else you want
to ask?
talk1071: <sp:3:0:2:0700><snd:Chat_01>You got it.<sp:5:0:0> I'll vacate the raft right away.
talk1025_01:
<sp:3:0:2:0a01><snd:Think_01>Hm. But I don't see any treasure like I was
imagining.<sp:5:0:0> How disappointing.
talk1072:
<sp:3:0:2:0001><snd:TalkPositive_00>Please just let me know when you're
ready to head out.
talk1024:
<sp:3:0:2:0101><snd:SurpriseM_01>I...I'm fine. Really.<sp:5:0:0> So sorry I kept
you waiting.
talk1073:
<sp:3:0:2:0301><snd:Wakeup_01>Oh... The way it is now, I can't really sit in
the raft. That seems important.<sp:0:4:0><sp:3:0:2:0101>I've been working on my leg strength,
sure, but I only just started getting them
pumped. Can you leave me a spot to sit?
talk1025:
<sp:3:0:2:0801><snd:LaughS_00>Look at that, Sasan...<sp:5:0:0> There's a stone
emitting a mysterious light!

<sp:3:0:2:0c01>Could this be the sacred shrine that
houses the blessed stone written of in
that ancient manuscript?
talk1026:
<sp:3:0:2:0701><snd:Think_00>Finley...<sp:5:0:0><sp:0:4:0><sp:3:0:2:0101>We journeyed to this cave all the way from
Zora's Domain in search of treasure.

It was really tough, but now the two of us
have the memory of seeing this sacred
shrine together.
<sp:3:0:2:0801><snd:Happy_00>That means more to me than any treasure
ever could!
talk1074:
<sp:3:0:2:0b00><snd:SurpriseL_00>Whoa! <sp:5:0:0>The raft is on fire!<sp:5:1:0> We've gotta put
out the flame!
talk1027:
<sp:3:0:2:0401><snd:SurpriseS_01>Sasan...<sp:5:0:0>


<sp:3:0:2:0801><snd:Happy_01>Our little treasure hunt...it was a blast. I'll
never forget it!

You're right. This memory is the greatest
treasure of all. Truly.
talk1075:
<sp:3:0:2:0b00><snd:SurpriseL_00>NO!<sp:5:0:0> I can't believe the raft broke...<sp:5:1:0>
This is awful.
talk1028:
<sp:3:0:2:0101><snd:Happy_01>Thank you so much for bringing me all the
way out here. <sp:5:0:0>It's because of you that
Finley and I have this treasured memory.
Oh, that reminds me! <sp:5:0:0>I need to reward
you!<sp:5:0:0> Take this. Please, I insist.
talk1076: <sp:3:0:2:0a01><snd:Tired_00>Phew...<sp:5:1:0> Wow...<sp:5:1:0> The fire is out, thankfully.<sp:5:0:0>
talk1029:
<sp:3:0:2:0101><snd:LaughS_00>I picked this up along the journey to the
cave!<sp:5:0:0> I'd be overjoyed if it helped you out
in some way.
talk1030:
<sp:3:0:2:0801><snd:Work_01>That sounds delightful!<sp:5:0:0>


However, let's be sure to hold hands as
we swim back so that we don't get
separated again!
talk1077: <sp:3:0:2:0a01><snd:Tired_00>Ugh...<sp:5:1:0> Phew...<sp:5:1:0> Somehow the raft is fixed.
talk1078:
<sp:3:0:2:0b01><snd:SurpriseS_01>Hey!<sp:5:0:0> I need that raft to get to Finley!<sp:5:0:0>
Please, please, please don't break it...
talk1032:
<sp:3:0:2:0801><snd:Happy_00>Please let me know when you're ready
to raft!
talk1033:
<sp:3:0:2:0301><snd:Wakeup_01>Oh... The way it is now, I can't really sit in
the raft. That seems important.<sp:0:4:0><sp:3:0:2:0101>I'm pretty sure I'll fall right in the water
unless I'm properly seated. Can you
please leave an open spot for me?
talk1035: <sp:3:0:2:0801><snd:LaughS_01>We did it!<sp:5:0:0> I'm finally here. Thank you!
talk1036:
<sp:3:0:2:0401><snd:Notice_01>Oh, um... <sp:5:0:0>You might be holding on to too
many things right now?<sp:5:0:0><sp:0:4:0>I really want to give you an <clr:0000>opal <clr:ffff>as
thanks.<sp:5:0:0> Once you organize your things,
it's all yours.
talk1037:
<sp:3:0:2:0101><snd:TalkPositive_00>I want to give you an <clr:0000>opal <clr:ffff>as thanks.
Let me know when you make some room.
talk1038:
<sp:3:0:2:0001><snd:TalkPositive>I want to give you an <clr:0000>opal <clr:ffff>too! You had
better make room for both.
